need-connect-permission: Ik heb geen `connect` permissie in dit spraak kanaal!
need-speak-permission: Ik heb geen `speak` permissie in dit spraak kanaal!
need-embed-permission-for-goodbye: Ik heb geen `embed links` permissie om afscheidsberichten te sturen in dit kanaal.
need-embed-permission-for-welcome: Ik heb geen `embed links` permissie om welkomstberichten te sturen in dit kanaal.
need-nsfw-channel-to-be-used: Je moet je in een NSFW kanaal bevinden om dit commando uit te voeren!
cant-send-pm: Ik kan je geen DM sturen, probeer me dit commando in DMs te sturen..
have-to-be-lover: Je moet een Lover op mijn server zijn om dat te mogen!
command-invalid-usage: Dat lijkt geen geldige optie. Gebruik `{}` voor meer informatie.
role-not-enough-high: Je rol is niet hoog genoeg.
put-the-role-id-instead: Ongeldig commando type. Je moet je ID van de rol invoeren. Deze vind je met
music-over-used: Sorry. Ik ben te veel in gebruik. Voor een acceptabele wereldwijde performance, kun je dit nu niet afspelen.
music-nodes-unavailable: Sorry. Music commands are disabled because all my servers are unavailable!
music-no-result: Sorry, er is geen resultaat voor je zoekopdracht. Probeer een geavanceerde zoekopdracht met {}.
music-load-failed: Sorry, deze video is niet meer beschikbaar. Probeer een geavanceerde zoekopdracht met {}.
music-not-in-dm: Muziek commando's kunnen niet in DMs worden gebruikt. Sorry!
music-not-my-channel: Je moet je in {} bevinden om dit commando te gebruiken.
music-volume-higher-than-100: Je moet een Patron op mijn server zijn om het volume hoger dan 100 te kunnen zetten.
music-when-adding-pl: Je kunt geen nummer toevoegen wanneer een afspeellijst wordt toegevoegd...
not-connected: Ik ben niet verbonden met voice!
not-playing: Ik ben niets aan het afspelen.
not-the-right-channel: Je moet je bevinden in spraak kanaal om dit commando te gebruiken.
bot-disabled-command: Je kunt dit commando niet gebruiken, het is uitgeschakeld op deze server.
bot-bind-mod: Je kunt geen commando's op dit kanaal gebruiken, ik ben in gebruik op een ander kanaal.
bot-cooldown: Je staat op cooldown. Probeer opnieuw na
bot-not-mp: dit commando kan niet worden gerbuikt in DMs.
bot-not-enough-permissions: Je kunt dit commando niet gebruiken, je hebt niet genoeg permissies.
cmd-clean-help:
Opschonen van berichten in het kanaal.
Wanneer je geen aantal aangeeft, worden 100 berichten verwijderd.
cmd-purge-help:
Verwijdert (num_msg) geplaatste berichten uit chat.
Wanneer je geen aantal aangeeft, worden 100 berichten verwijderd.
cmd-stfu-help:
Verwijdert (num_msg) door een gebruiker geplaatste berichten uit chat.
Wanneer je geen aantal aangeeft, worden 100 berichten verwijderd.
cmd-prefix-change-help: Toestaan om het huidige server voorvoegsel te wijzigen.
cmd-prefix-reset-help: Terugzetten van het server voorvoegsel naar de globale instelling.
cmd-prefix-now-help: Weergave van het huidige server voorvoegsel.
cmd-ignore-help: Schakelt mijn commando's uit in het huidige kanaal.
cmd-disabledcommand-help: Beheer uitgeschakelde commando's van de server.
cmd-disabledcommand-add-help: Schakel een commando uit op de server.
cmd-disabledcommand-remove-help: Schakelt een uitgeschakeld commando opnieuw in.
cmd-language-help:
Taal instelling.
Beschikbare talen worden weergegeven met talenlijst.
cmd-blacklist-add-help:
Voegt een gebruiker to aan de gilde blacklist.
Deze gebruikers kunnen mijn commando's niet gebruiken.
cmd-blacklist-remove-help: Verwijderd een gebruiker of rol van de gilde blacklist.
cmd-kick-help: Een gebruiker van de server kicken.
cmd-ban-help: Een gebruiker van de server verbannen.
cmd-hackban-help: Verban een gebruiker van de server met zijn ID.
cmd-welcome-help:
Stel een bericht in dat wordt verstuurd wanneer een gebruiker de server betreedt.
Wanneer je een afbeeldingsURL specificeert, wordt de link automatisch verborgen.
Je kunt de volgende sleutelwoorden gebruiken. Deze worden vervangen:

{user.name} : Gebruikersnaam
{user.mention} : Gebruiker mention
{server.name} : Server naam
{user.id} : GebruikersID
{server_member_count} : Gebruikersnummer op de server
cmd-goodbye-help:
Stel een bericht in dat wordt verstuurd wanneer een gebruiker de server verlaat.
Wanneer je een afbeeldingsURL specificeert, wordt de link automatisch verborgen.
Je kunt de volgende sleutelwoorden gebruiken. Deze worden vervangen:

{user.name} : Gebruikersnaam
{user.mention} : Gebruiker mention
{server.name} : Server naam
{user.id} : GebruikersID
{server_member_count} : Gebruikersnummer op de server
cmd-autorole-help: Stel een (of meerdere) autorol voor nieuwe leden op de server.
cmd-autorole-set-help: Voegt een autorol voor nieuwe leden van de server toe.
cmd-autorole-now-help: Geeft de huidige autorol van de server weer.
cmd-autorole-reset-help: Verwijdert alle huidige autorol van de server.
cmd-autorole-remove-help: Removes an autorole from the current autoroles of the server.
cmd-joinclan-help: Toestaan om een rol te krijgen. Je kunt geen lid zijn van meerdere clans tegelijkertijd.
cmd-clan-add-help: Toestaan een clan toe te voegen aan de server. Gebruikers kunnen lid worden met joinclan
cmd-clan-delete-help: Toestaan een clan van de server te verwijderen.
cmd-clan-list-help: Weergave van beschikbare clans op de server.
cmd-8ball-help: Een willekeurige antwoord op je vraag.
cmd-ily-help: Ik wil weten of ik van je houd.
cmd-roll-help:
Genereer een willekeurige nummer tussen 0 en gespecificeerd maximum.
Kan ook een willekeurig nummer genereren tussen twee nummers.
Standaard genereert het een willekeurig nummer tussen 0 en 100.
cmd-flip-help: Gooit een munt op wanneer geen gebruiker gespecificeerd. Anders gooit het een gebruiker op.
cmd-dog-help: Laat een willekeurige afbeelding zien van een hond.
cmd-cat-help: Laat een willekeurige afbeelding zien van een kat.
cmd-customcommand-help:
Management van custom commando's op de server.
Je kunt ook je eigen commando aanmaken, voor meer informatie, gebruike help cc add.

- AfbeeldingsURLs worden automatisch verborgen in custom commando's.
cmd-customcommand-add-help:
Toestaan om een custom commando toe te voegen op de server.
Door te starten met >>>, voert het custom commando het geselecteerde commando uit.
Door && tussen commando's te plaatsen, worden alle commando's uitgevoerd.
cmd-customcommand-raw-help: Laat de daadwerkelijke content van een custom commando zien.
cmd-customcommand-edit-help: Toestaan om een bestaand custom commando te bewerken.
cmd-customcommand-delete-help: Toestaan om een custom commando te verwijderen van de server.
cmd-customcommand-list-help: Weergave van de custom commando lijst.
cmd-ascii-help: Weergave van tekst in ascii vorm.
cmd-poll-help: CreÃ«er een poll met een gegeven vraag.
cmd-meme-help:
Genereert een meme.
Laat je tekst op de gebruikersavatar of eigen afbeelding zien.
cmd-osu-help:
Laat informatie zien over een osu! profiel
Je kunt een modus kiezen. Wanneer je geen modus specificeert wordt de standaard gerbuikt.
Mode lijst : Standard, Taiko, Ctb, Mania
cmd-choice-help:
Selecteert een willekeurige optie uit verschillende opties.
Door te starten met >>>, wordt het geselecteerde commando uitgevoerd.

- AfbeeldingsURLs worden automatisch verborgen in dit commando.
cmd-char-help: Laat informatie zien over een karakter. (Anime/Manga)
cmd-nextep-help: Laat de resterende tijd zien tot aan de volgende aflevering van een anime.
cmd-picture-help: Laat mijn afbeelding commando's lijst. (Powered by weeb.sh en triggered-api.tk)
cmd-help-help: Laat mijn commando's zien of laat help zien voor een commando.
cmd-shard-help: Laat zien op welke shard je je nu bevindt.
cmd-me-help: Toestaan om als mij te praten.
cmd-avatar-help:
Laat een gebruikersavatar zien.
Wanneer je geen gebruiker specificeert wordt je eigen avatar getoond.
cmd-userinfo-help:
Laat informatie zien over een gebruiker.
Wanneer je geen gebruiker specificeert, wordt je eigen informatie getoond.
cmd-roleinfo-help: Laat rol informatie zien. Let op: dit is hoofdlettergevoelig.
cmd-changelog-help:
Displays my last patch notes.
For further information about old patch notes, visit my official server.
cmd-don-help: Displays information and links to support me.
cmd-id-help:
Displays the ID of a user.
If you don't specify any user, it displays yours.
cmd-suggestion-help: Sends a suggestion to the developer.
cmd-bug-help: Reports a bug to the developer.
cmd-feedback-help: Sends a feedback about me to the developer.
cmd-giverole-help: Gives a role to an user on the gilde.
cmd-setrole-help: Configures which roles can be obtained with the getrole command.
cmd-setrole-add-help: Makes a role obtainable with the getrole command.
cmd-setrole-remove-help: Un-makes a role obtainable with the getrole command.
cmd-setrole-reset-help: Resets the list of the obtainable roles.
cmd-setrole-list-help: Displays every roles which can be obtained with the getrole command.
cmd-getrole-help: Allows to get a role or to remove it. Warning, dit is case sensitive.
cmd-join-help: Summons me into your spraak kanaal or into the specified one.
cmd-play-help:
Enqueues a song with an url or keywords.
Can also enqueue a stream or a radio.
cmd-bind-help: Avoid the use of the commands in every channel except in the one where the command is used.
cmd-stop-help: Stops the player and clears the queue.
cmd-resume-help: Resumes a song if it is currently paused.
cmd-forceskip-help:
Skips the current song without needing to vote.
If you specify a queue position, skips every song until the chosen position.
cmd-np-help: Returns some information about the current song.
cmd-active-help: Displays all my players with their status.
cmd-volume-help:
Sets the playback volume. Accepted values are from 0 to 1000.
Putting + or - before the volume will make the volume change relative to the current volume.
If you don't specify any new volume, returns the current volume.
cmd-plstart-help:
Starts an autoplaylist.
If you don't specify an autoplaylist, it loads yours.
cmd-plnew-help: Creates a new autoplaylist that can be loaded.
cmd-plinfo-help: Gives information about an autoplaylist, if you don't specify one, about the current autoplaylist.
cmd-plrepair-help: Repairs an autoplaylist, if you don't specify one, repairs the current autoplaylist.
cmd-lyrics-help:
Displays the lyrics of a song.
If you don't specify any url or keywords, it displays the current song lyrics.
cmd-pladd-help:
Adds a song to the current autoplaylist, if you don't specify an url, adds the current song to the autoplaylist.
You can use keywords to try to add it without url.
cmd-plremove-help:
Removes a song from the current autoplaylist, if you don't specify an url, removes the current song from the autoplaylist.
You can use keywords to try to remove it without url.
You can specify the position in the autoplaylist (can be find with plinfo)
cmd-plclear-help:
Deletes an autoplaylist and all of its content.
Warning : This operation cannot be undone.
cmd-plsettings-help:
Displays information about an autoplaylist or edits its settings.
Whitelisted users can repair, add and remove songs in the autoplaylist.
Everyone can use every autoplaylist, even if they are private.
Everyone can add/remove/repair the autoplaylist if it's not private.
cmd-plclone-help: Creates an autoplaylist by copying an existing autoplaylist.
cmd-promote-help:
Moves a song by specifying its queue index.
If you don't specify an after position, moves it to the first position of the queue.
If you don't specify a song either, it will promotes the last song of queue to the first position of the queue.
cmd-remove-help:
Removes a song from the queue.
If you don't specify any position, removes the last song in queue.
Otherwise remove a song based on its position in queue.
You can specify a second position to remove every song between the two positions.
cmd-playnext-help: Enqueues a song to the first position of the queue.
cmd-replaynow-help: Speelt onmiddellijk het huidige nummer af.
cmd-setdj-help:
Configures DJ roles.
Member with a DJ role can uses every musical commands.
cmd-setdj-set-help: Adds the DJ permissions to a specified role.
cmd-setdj-remove-help: Removes the DJ permissions to a specified role.
cmd-setdj-reset-help: Removes the DJ permissions of every role on the server.
cmd-setdj-now-help: Displays every roles with the DJ permissions.
cmd-setdj-all-help: Grants my DJ permissions to everyone on the server.
cmd-radio-play-help: Adds a radio to the queue to be played.
cmd-radio-list-help: Displays the list of my available radio stations.
cmd-search-help:
Searches multiple videos at once with the selected parameters.
You can add one of them to the queue. If no service are specified, YouTube is selected by default.

List of the services (platform where the video is searched) :
- YouTube (yt) (by default)
- SoundCloud (sc)
cmd-moveto-help: Moves the song to a specific moment.
cmd-download-help:
Allows to create a download link for a YouTube video.
If don't specify an URL, for the current song.
cmd-defvote-help: Manages the default vote Threshold for some commands for users without DJ permissions.
cmd-defvote-now-help: Displays the current default vote Threshold.
cmd-autoleave-help: Activity time before disconnecting from voice channel management.
cmd-autoleave-now-help: Displays my current time before leaving the voice channel for inactivity.
cmd-autoleave-set-help: Edits my time before leaving the voice channel for inactivity.
cmd-autoleave-reset-help: Resets my time before leaving the voice channel for inactivity.
cmd-autoleave-never-help: Disables my auto-disconnect function for inactivity.
cmd-npmsg-now-help: Displays my current setting about auto now playing messages at the beginning of new songs.
cmd-npmsg-set-help: Choose a default channel for auto now playing messages.
cmd-npmsg-reset-help: Resets my setting about auto now playing messages at the beginning of new songs.
cmd-npmsg-never-help: Disables now playing messages at the beginning of new songs.
cmd-divorce-help: Divorces you from whoever you were married to.
cmd-owo-help: Enables or disables my OwO Mod.
cmd-lazy-help: Enables or disables my Lazy Mod.
cmd-autoplay-help:
Enables or disables the autoplay of recommended song when the queue is empty.
Only available with YouTube links.
cmd-relatedsong-help:
Enqueues a related song based on a specified URL. 
If no URL is specified, about the current song.
Only works with YouTube links.
cmd-blacklist-r-removed: This role has been removed from the guild blacklist.
cmd-blacklist-removed: User has been removed from the guild blacklist.
cmd-blacklist-no-bl-og: There is no user blacklisted on this server.
cmd-clean-cleaned-messages: messages were removed from this channel.
cmd-clean-cleaned-message: message was removed from this channel.
cmd-prefix-set-prefix:
Prefix set for this server.
To go back to the normal prefix, do `{}`.

cmd-ignore-commands-enabled: My commands are now enabled on this channel.
cmd-ignore-enabled: {} commands has been enabled anew in {}.
cmd-ignore-no-anymore: There is no disabled command in this channel anymore.
cmd-dc-cmd-not-found: I don't have a command called like that.
cmd-dc-add-cmd-now-disabled: Command `{}` now disabled on this server.
cmd-dc-add-already-disabled: This command already disabled!. Use `{}` to enable it anew.
cmd-dc-delete-no-disabled-commands: There are no disabled commands on this server. Use `{}` to start disabling some.
cmd-dc-list-no-dc-list: No disabled commands on this server.
cmd-language-invalid-language: I don't know this language! You can display the list of my available languages with {}
cmd-kick-cant-kick-myself: Nice try, but I can't kick or ban myself.
cmd-kick-confirmation-kick: Do you really want to kick **{}** ? Type `yes` or `no`.
cmd-kick-kicked: You have been kicked from **{}** by
cmd-ban-confirmation-ban: Do you really want to ban **{}** ? Type `yes` or `no`.
cmd-ban-banned: You have been banned from **{}** by
cmd-hackban-confirmation-ban: Do you really want to hackban **{}** ? Type `yes` or `no`.

I didn't find any welcome message on this channel.
You can set a welcome message by doing {}

I didn't find any goodbye message on this channel.
You can set a goodbye message by doing {}

cmd-goodbye-off-already: The goodbye message is already disabled on this channel...
cmd-goodbye-off-success: The goodbye message is now disabled on this channel.

cmd-autorole-list-one-role: The autorole on this server is : {}.
cmd-autorole-no-autorole: There are no autoroles on this server !
cmd-joinclan-no-clans-available: No clan can be joined, you can allow people to get them with {}
cmd-joinclan-cant-be-given: This role cannot be given, you can allow people to get them with {}
cmd-joinclan-already-have-clan: You already have a clan... You cannot join another.
cmd-joinclan-role-not-found: Sorry, I didn't find any role called `{}` on this server.
cmd-clan-no-clans: Currently, there are no existing clans on this server. Use `{}` to start to add some.

cmd-flip-nice-try: Nice try. How about this instead ?
cmd-flip-success: flips a coin and it gives...
cmd-customcommand-in-basic-command: This command already exists in my basic commands.
cmd-customcommand-already-exists: This command already exists. Use {} to edit it.
cmd-customcommand-raw-content: The content of the custom command {} is :
cmd-customcommand-raw-no-cc: There are no custom commands in this server. Use {} to start adding some.
cmd-customcommand-failed-edit: This command doesn't exist. Use {} to add it.
cmd-poll-init: Say a poll option to add to the poll or say {} to publish the poll.
cmd-poll-cancelled: Poll cancelled, no options have been said.
cmd-meme-one-user: Please mention only one user at a time.
cmd-choice-no-choices: You have to specify more than one option, separated by `|`.
cmd-choice-too-much-cmds: Too much commands at the same time.
cmd-nextep-not-found: I didn't find any results for this anime.
cmd-nextep-not-airing: This anime is not airing anymore!
cmd-slap-yourself: {}, you got a slap from yourself?!
cmd-punch-yourself: {}, you got a punch from yourself?!
cmd-shoot-yourself: I'll not let you do this!
cmd-help-help-not-found: I didn't find any help for this command!
cmd-help-description: You can create your own aliases and commands with customcommands.
cmd-help-more-info-cmd: For more information about a command use
cmd-help-more-info-cat: For more information about a category use
cmd-help-support: If you have any question you can ask it on {}
cmd-shard: This server is on the shard {} !
cmd-info:
**About:** ```I'm Hazuki Watora, a bot created by Zenrac#0001 in 2016 with python 3.5.
In 2018 I got fully rewritten from 0 with the rewrite of discord.py on Python 3.6.
I'm mostly a musical bot, but not only! I was totally coded with discord.py. (Thanks to Danny)``````The character Hazuki Watora was drawn/created by Peko. I don't own any of Watora pictures. https://www.zerochan.net/Peko / http://lumino.sakura.ne.jp``````You can get my command list with =help
You can get more information about permissions with =permsinfo
You can display my special thanks with =credits``````fix
By using me, you accept the fact that I can conserve the history of the used commands.```
cmd-credits-title: List of the people who made this bot possible.
cmd-perms-info:
**Help with permissions:**
```My permissions are mostly based on your server/channel permissions.

Examples :
- You cannot use the ban command if you cannot ban users.
- You cannot use the purge command if you cannot manage messages.

I'll grant you more functionalities if you're alone in a voice channel with me, or if you have DJ permissions.``````fix
DJ permissions :``````They allow to use every musical commands without necessarily having high permissions on the server.

To grant the DJ permissions to someone, you have to give him a DJ role.``````fix
DJ Role :``````This is a role that allows to use all musical commands by having it, it grants the same permissions in the case of someone alone in a voice channel with me.

You can set a role as a DJ role with the {}setdj command.
A role called DJ is giving DJ permissions by default.```
cmd-suggestion-useless: Please don't try to send useless suggestion.
cmd-bug-useless: Please don't try to send useless report.
cmd-feedback-useless: Please don't try to send useless feedback.
cmd-giverole-remove: I remove the {} role from {}'s roles.
cmd-setrole-reset: From now, there are no roles which can be obtained with the {} command anymore!
cmd-setrole-already: This role can already be obtained.
cmd-setrole-added: New role that can be obtained added.
cmd-setrole-removed: This role has been removed from the role that can be obtained.
cmd-getrole-no-role-available: There are no role that can be obtained, you can make some obtainable with {}.
cmd-getrole-role-not-obtainable: This role cannot be given, you can make it obtainable with {}.
cmd-getrole-not-enough-perm: {}, I don't have enough permissions to remove your {} role.
cmd-getrole-not-enough-perm-add: I don't have enough permissions to give the {} role.

cmd-marry-author-a-married:
Sorry but you are already married!
Use {} if you want to divorce.
cmd-marry-a-together: But you are already married together !

cmd-marry-success: Congratulations, {} and {} are now bound by marriage!
cmd-marry-declined: Sorry {}, your proposal has been declined...
cmd-divorce-confirmation:
Do you really want to divorce with {} ? You are married since the {}.
Type {} or {}.
music-spotify-not-supported: That is not a supported Spotify URI or URL.
music-spotify-maybe-prob: You either provided an invalid URI, or there was a problem.
music-spotify-disabled: Sorry... My Spotify Integration is disabled at the moment. Try again later!
music-spotify-all-failed: Sorry... Everything failed, I didn't add anything!
music-autoplaylist-noten-perms: This autoplaylist is private. You don't have the permission to edit it.
music-autoplaylist-only-owner: Only the autoplaylist owner can edit the autoplaylist settings.
music-plsettings-got-deleted: The current autoplaylist has been deleted. You can't edit or display information about it.
music-join-playing-a-song: I'm already playing a song in a voice channel. You don't have enough permission to make me join yours.
music-join-no-channel: No channel to join. Please join one.
music-join-failed: Unable to connect to the voice channel at this time. Please try again.
music-join-moved-fail: Unable to move this channel. Perhaps missing permissions?
music-play-adding-pl-cancelled: Adding playlist cancelled... I'm not in the voice channel anymore.
music-play-added-pl: {} songs succefully added in the queue (in {}s, about {}s per song).
music-play-not-added-pl: No song has been added. Sorry.
music-bind-disabling: I'm not bound to any channel anymore.
music-bind-enabling: I'm now bound to this channel. Commands are now restricted to this channel only.
music-stop-song-running: A song is running, I can't leave without votes!
music-stop-vote: Your vote to make me disconnect myself has been added!
music-stop-already: You have already voted to make me disconnect myself...
music-skip-already: You have already voted to skip this song.
music-volume-unreasonable-volume-relativ: Unreasonable volume change provided: {}{:+} -> {}%. Provide a change between `{}%` and `{:+}%`.
music-volume-unreasonable-volume: Unreasonable volume provided: {}%. Provide a value between `0%` and `100%`.
music-volume-unreasonable-volume-patreon: Unreasonable volume provided: {}%. Provide a value between `0%` and `1000%`.
music-plnow-no-pl: The autoplaylist is disabled! Use {} to load an autoplaylist!
music-plnow-now-user-auto:
The current autoplaylist is {}'s personal autoplaylist.
Autoplaylist: `{}/{}`
music-plnow-now-user: The current autoplaylist is {}'s personal autoplaylist.
music-plstart-your-loaded: Your personal autoplaylist has been loaded!
music-plstart-dont-have: Sorry! This user doesn't have a personal autoplaylist.
music-plstart-doesnt-exists: The autoplaylist called {} doesn't exist! Please ensure your message or use {} if you want to create it.
music-plnew-special-char: Please don't use any specials characters.
music-plnew-try-to-hack: You cannot create a personal autoplaylist like this, especially if it's not your ID.
music-plinfo-not-found: I didn't find this autoplaylist... Sorry!

cmd-bassboost-help:
Changes the player's bass frequencies up to 5 levels. OFF, LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, INSANE and WTF.
You can use the equalizer to make adjustments as you want.
cmd-equalizer-help:
Manages an equalizer with 15 bands. Valid values are from -0.25 to 1.
-0.25 means that the given frequency is completely muted and 0.25 means it is doubled.
Use reactions to move the cursor and edit gains interactively. You can press the circle to reset the equalizer.
Otherwise you can specify a band and a gain to edit it quickly.
cmd-voicekick-help: Kicks a user from a voice channel.
cmd-autoconnect-set-help:
Allows to add channels on which I'll autoconnect myself when someone joins it.
You can specify either an URL, query, an autoplaylist or a radio.
cmd-autoconnect-remove-help: Removes a channel from my autoconnect channels.
cmd-autoconnect-reset-help: Resets all my autoconnect channels on this server.
cmd-autoconnect-now-help: Displays the list of the current autoconnect channels on the server.
music-autoconnect-list-empty: This server doesn't have any autoconnect channel. Use {} to start to add some.
music-autoconnect-limit: You reached your maximum number of autoconnect channels ({}) ! To increase this limit you need to be a Patron and you have to claim this server.
music-autoleave-need-claim: You need to claim this server by using {} !
manage-autoleave-time: You can manage autoleave time with {}.
cmd-plfind-help:
Searches for an autoplaylist sorted by upvote.
You can specify a query to narrow your search.
cmd-plupvote-help:
Upvotes an autoplaylist.
Autoplaylists with more upvotes have more visibility.
cmd-minesweeper-help:
Starts a minesweeper game.
Available levels:
cmd-blindtest-no-enough-param: Not enough parameters have been given to start a blindtest...
cmd-blindtest-mal-same-time: You can only start {} anime lists at the same time.
cmd-blindtest-max-animelist: You can't put this amount of anime lists. (max is 5)
cmd-blindtest-empty: This autoplaylist is empty! It requires at least one song to start a blindtest...
cmd-blindtest-help:
Starts a blindtest in the current channel.

Available options:

longestword=true|false (Default to False):
 Accept the longest word as a good answer.

listening=true|false (Default to False):
 Do not accept answers, just listen the songs.

timeout=number (Default to 120):
 Timeout before stopping the song if not found. Between 3 and 300 seconds.

severity=number (Default to 100):
 Severity in percentage of word to accept an answer. Between 1 and 100%.

percentage=number,number,number (Default to 100,0,0):
 Percentage of OP, ED, OST. The sum of all values should be 100.

wait=number (Default to 5):
 Time to wait before each song. Between 0 and 30 seconds.

argument=status (Default to all):
 Only select a type of watched anime in the given anime lists.
Available status are: all, completed, watching, onhold, dropped, ptw.

remove=status,status2 (Default to ptw):
 Ignore a type (or serveral) of watched anime (separated by commas) in the given anime lists.
Available status are: completed, watching, onhold, dropped, ptw.
cmd-blindtest-is-running: A blindtest is already running.. Do you want to stop it ? (yes/no)
cmd-blindtest-invalid-value: The value {} isn't valid for the parameter {}.
cmd-blindtest-start: Starting a blindtest game in this channel with {} songs!
cmd-blindtest-mal-fail: Failed to fetch information from MyAnimeList, try again later!
cmd-blindtest-same-remove: You cannot set the same value to this parameters or it will give an empty result.
cmd-blindtestscore-no-saved: No score currently saved on this server... Use {} to start a blindtest!
cmd-plsettings-modify-name: You can't modify the autoplaylist's name. You can only edit the uppercases and lowercases of the name.
